TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenService extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义安全令牌服务 (STS) 的属性和方法的抽象基类。

span.span: The abstract base class that defines the properties and methods of a security token service (STS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建的 STS 必须派生自类。To create an STS you must derive from the class. 在您的自定义类必须最小值，重写和方法。In your custom class you must, at a minimum, override the and methods. 通过这些重写，STS 创建使用所有其他方法的类中定义的默认实现是能够颁发安全令牌来响应对安全令牌请求 (RST)。With these overrides, the STS created using the default implementation of all the other methods defined in the class is capable of issuing security tokens in response to security token requests (RST). 也就是说，实现 Ws-trust 规范中定义的问题绑定。That is, the Issue binding defined in the WS-Trust specification is implemented. 在中实现此绑定方法。This binding is implemented in the method. 默认情况下实现的任何其他 WS 信任绑定 （续订、 取消和验证） 和相应的错误返回给调用方，如果遇到 RST 对应于这些绑定之一。None of the other WS-Trust bindings (Renew, Cancel, and Validate) are implemented in the default case and an appropriate fault is returned to the caller if an RST that corresponds to one of these bindings is encountered. 当然，可以重写适当的方法 (， ，和) 在您的 STS 中实现这些绑定。You can, of course, override the appropriate methods (, , and ) to implement these bindings in your STS. > [!IMPORTANT] > 实现生产就绪 STS 需要进行仔细的规划和大量的资源来缓解公开此类服务中固有的潜在安全风险。Implementing a production-ready STS entails careful planning and considerable resources to mitigate the potential security risks inherent in exposing such a service. 使用 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 的大多数开发人员将开发的应用程序标识将管理外包给 STS，而不是本身开发 STS。Most developers using Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) will be developing applications that outsource identity management to an STS, rather than developing an STS itself. WIF 提供了 Visual Studio 扩展，用于标识和访问工具 Visual Studio 2012 中，可帮助开发人员在开发环境中测试解决方案。WIF provides a Visual Studio extension, the Identity and Access Tool for Visual Studio 2012, to help developers test solutions in the development environment. 此工具包含 STS， `LocalSTS`，可以配置为服务于你正在开发的应用程序的特定声明。This tool includes an STS, `LocalSTS`, that you can configure to serve specific claims to the application that you are developing. 有关标识和访问工具的详细信息，请参阅[标识和访问工具适用于 Visual Studio 2012](~/docs/framework/security/identity-and-access-tool-for-vs.md)。For more information about the Identity and Access tool, see [Identity and Access Tool for Visual Studio 2012](~/docs/framework/security/identity-and-access-tool-for-vs.md). 在某些情况下，`LocalSTS`可能无法提供必要的功能，充分地测试你的应用程序; 例如，在涉及的方案中开发应用程序使用的自定义令牌处理程序。In some scenarios, `LocalSTS` may not provide the functionality necessary to adequately test your application; for example, in a scenario that involves developing a custom token handler for use by an application. 在这些情况下，您可以从其中若要创建一个或多个简单 Sts，可以在开发环境中部署和可用于在你的应用程序中测试此类功能。In these cases, you can derive from to create one or more simple STSs that can be deployed in your development environment and that can be used to test such features in your application. 本部分的其余部分侧重于公开的方法，可以实现简单的 STS 并扩展令牌颁发管道的类。The rest of this section focuses on the methods exposed by the class that enable you to implement a simple STS and extend the token issuance pipeline. 下面的列表提供给开发人员最为重要的方法的简要概述了在测试或开发环境中使用。The following list provides a brief overview of the methods of primary importance to the developer for use in a test or development environment. - 方法。The method. 此方法返回对象，其中包含有关 RP 的信息。This method returns a object that contains information about the RP. 此对象用于令牌颁发管道的其余部分，并包括以下信息的签名和加密凭据用于在响应中，并将`AppliesTo`和`ReplyTo`（如果需要） 地址。This object is used in the rest of the token issuance pipeline and includes information about the signing and encrypting credentials to use in the response, as well as the `AppliesTo` and `ReplyTo` (if required) addresses. 必须重写此方法。You must override this method. - 方法。The method. 此方法返回对象，其中包含要返回到 RP 的声明。This method returns an object that contains the claims to return to the RP. 必须重写此方法。You must override this method. - 方法。The method. 此方法实现令牌请求管道，它处理传入安全令牌请求 (RST)，并包含一个令牌，可用于使用 RP 进行身份验证的调用方返回响应 (RSTR)。This method implements the token request pipeline, which processes an incoming security token request (RST) and returns a response (RSTR) to the caller that contains a token that can be used to authenticate with an RP. 中定义的其他方法的许多类调用此方法，包括和方法。Many of the other methods defined in the class are called from this method, including the and methods. 无需重写此方法，但了解它实现的令牌请求管道可能会有所帮助。You do not have to override this method, but an understanding of the token request pipeline it implements may be helpful. 通过配置 STS类。An STS is configured through the class. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题取自`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，它包含一个实现被动 STS 能够提供服务的 SWT 令牌。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现主动 STS 的示例，可以看到`Federation Metadata`示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 了解有关这些示例和其他可用的示例 wif 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码显示了被动 STS 的实现使用类。The following code shows the implementation of a passive STS using the class. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#3)] 下面的代码演示如何调用自定义被动 STS，处理 WS 联合身份验证请求，通过调用方法中的代码后面`default.aspx.cs`文件。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用从令牌颁发管道，由实现方法。The method is called from the token issuance pipeline, which is implemented by the method. 它将返回，其中包含要在基于令牌的请求者颁发的安全令牌中包含的声明 (`principal`参数)，传入 RST (`request`参数)，并为其令牌的信赖方预期 （`scope`参数)。It returns an that contains the claims to include in the issued security token based on the requestor of the token (the `principal` parameter), the incoming RST (the `request` parameter), and the relying party for which the token is intended (the `scope` parameter). 在这种方法的逻辑主要关心回答以下问题：The logic in this method is primarily concerned with answering the following questions: - **应根据的 RP 所针对的响应中包括哪种声明类型？****Which claim types should be included in the response based on the RP for which it is intended?** 这通常通过检查确定每个 RP 根据从列表中所需的每个 RP 的声明类型或基于每个请求请求的属性。Typically this is decided on a per-RP basis from lists of claim types required for each RP or on a per-request basis by examining the property of the request. 但是，逻辑和用于确定要在响应中包含的声明的详细信息是完全由您的实现。However, the logic and details for determining the claims to include in the response is completely up to your implementation. - **该声明的值应分配给响应中的声明？****Which claim values should be assigned to the claims in the response?** 对于标识提供者 (IP-STS)，这通常意味着使用的请求者的一个或多个声明(由`principal`参数) 来访问应用商店 （或其他实体） 以返回所需的声明类型的值。For an Identity Provider (IP-STS) this typically means using one or more claims in the requestor’s (provided by the `principal` parameter) to access a store (or other entity) to return values for the required claim types. 对于联合身份验证提供程序 (R-STS) 这通常意味着对请求者的传入声明来满足请求; 执行某种类型的处理上提供的请求者，同时传递其他人通过未修改某些声明可能执行筛选或转换。For a Federation Provider (R-STS) this typically means performing some kind of processing on the requestor’s incoming claims to fulfill the request; perhaps performing filtering or transformation on some claims presented by the requestor, while passing others through unmodified. 当然，如确定哪些声明在响应中包含的情况下，所示的详细信息和如何确定这些声明的值的逻辑负责您的实现。Of course, as in the case of deciding which claims to include in the response, the details and logic of how to determine the values of these claims is up to your implementation. ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自`Custom Token`示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，它包含一个实现被动 STS 能够提供服务的 SWT 令牌。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现主动 STS 的示例，可以看到`Federation Metadata`示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 了解有关这些示例和其他可用的示例 wif 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示如何重写方法以返回声明的 STS。The following code shows how to override the method to return claims for your STS. 在此示例中，则忽略此请求安全令牌 (RST) 消息和返回用户通过身份验证后在 STS 上基于声明的集合。In this example, the Request Security Token (RST) message is ignored and a collection of claims based on the user as authenticated at the STS is returned. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从令牌颁发管道中，由实现调用的最后一步方法。The method is called as the last step from the token issuance pipeline, which is implemented by the method. 它创建并返回响应 (RSTR) 通过使用原始的传入请求 (RST)，并在令牌颁发管道中的上一步骤过程中已生成的标记说明符。It creates and returns the response (RSTR) by using the original incoming request (RST) and the token descriptor that was built up during previous steps in the token issuance pipeline. 默认实现将通过传递 RST 的请求参数中指定创建 RSTR构造函数中，调用上的标记说明符的方法传递到应用其属性设置为新创建 RSTR，设置属性上使用 RSTR上的标记说明符的属性和最后设置RSTR 根据下表上的属性：The default implementation creates the RSTR by passing the RST specified in the request parameter to the constructor, invoking the method on the token descriptor passed into to apply its properties to the newly created RSTR, setting the property on the RSTR by using the property on the token descriptor, and finally setting the property on the RSTR according to the following table: |`RST.ReplyTo` 属性`RST.ReplyTo` property| 属性。 property.|`RSTR.ReplyTo` 属性`RSTR.ReplyTo` property| |----------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------| |SetSet|未设置Not Set|未设置Not Set| |SetSet|SetSet|| |未设置Not Set|SetSet|未设置Not Set| |未设置Not Set|未设置Not Set|未设置Not Set|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从令牌颁发管道后调用方法方法应返回配置传入请求的对象。The method is called from the token issuance pipeline after the method and should return a object configured for the incoming request. (在中实现令牌颁发管道方法。)对象封装有关 RP 与安全令牌请求 (RST) 关联的信息。(The token issuance pipeline is implemented in the method.) The object encapsulates information about the RP associated with the security token request (RST). 这包括有关要用于 RP 和对任何已颁发的令牌和/或响应中的对称密钥进行加密的加密和签名凭据的信息。This includes information about the encrypting and signing credentials to be used with the RP and whether or not to encrypt any issued tokens and/or symmetric keys in the response. 在中执行一些典型任务方法是：Some typical tasks performed in the method are: - 确定的 RP 令牌所针对的是已识别的 RP。Determine whether the RP for which the token is intended is a recognized RP. 如何实现这一点取决于您的实现。How this is accomplished depends on your implementation. 如果预期的 RP 不是有效的 RP 此 sts，则该方法应引发。If the intended RP is not a valid RP for this STS, then the method should throw an . - 确定要使用的响应 (RSTR) 以及设置签名凭据属性相应地。Determine the signing credentials to be used in the response (RSTR) and set the property accordingly. - 确定是否应加密响应和/或任何包含对称密钥以及要用于加密的凭据。Determine whether the response and/or any included symmetrical keys should be encrypted and the credentials to be used for encryption. 设置， ，和属性相应地。Set the , , and properties accordingly. > [!IMPORTANT] > 默认情况下并属性设置`true`以防止 STS 颁发令牌是不安全的。By default, the and properties are set `true` to prevent the STS from issuing tokens that are not secure. 建议，这些属性永远不会设置为`false`在生产环境中。It is recommended that these properties never be set to `false` in a production environment. - 确定应为其返回的响应的地址。Determine the address to which the response should be returned. 设置或属性相应地。Set either the or property accordingly. ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自`Custom Token`示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，它包含一个实现被动 STS 能够提供服务的 SWT 令牌。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现主动 STS 的示例，可以看到`Federation Metadata`示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 了解有关这些示例和其他可用的示例 wif 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码示例演示 方法的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the method. 此实现验证 RP 识别的 sts，验证中的请求和集地址属性相应地，和集进行签名和加密的凭据与 RP 使用基于证书在文件中是硬编码。This implementation verifies that the RP is recognized by the STS, validates the address in the request and sets the property accordingly, and sets the signing and encrypting credentials to use with the RP based on certificates that are hard-coded in the file. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#4)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#5)] [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenservice.cs#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现 Ws-trust 规范中定义的问题绑定。This method implements the Issue binding defined in the WS-Trust specification. 默认实现方法处理令牌颁发 （声明颁发） 管道通过将传入请求 (RST)，并返回任一响应 (RSTR)，其中包含具有相应声明进行身份验证的安全令牌请求者与 RP 或相应的异常。The default implementation of the method processes the incoming request (RST) through a token issuance (claims issuance) pipeline and returns either a response (RSTR) that contains a security token with the appropriate claims to authenticate the requestor with the RP or an appropriate exception. 中的默认实现的令牌颁发管道包含对以下方法的调用 (的类)。The token issuance pipeline in the default implementation consists of calls to the following methods (of the class). 1. 方法来验证请求 (RST)。The method to validate the request (RST). 2. 方法以获取对象，其中包含有关与请求关联的信赖方 (RP) 信息。The method to get a object that contains information about the relying party (RP) associated with the request. 必须重写此方法。You must override this method. 如果将返回`null`、引发。If returns `null`, a is thrown. 3. 方法以返回安全令牌描述符基于 RST 和上一步中返回的对象。The method to return a security token descriptor based on the RST and the object returned in the previous step. 安全令牌描述符 () 包含可由令牌处理程序的窗体中的请求有关的信息。The security token descriptor () contains information about the request in a form that can be used by a token handler. 属性设置为调用所返回的描述符。The property is set to the descriptor returned by the call. 如果`null`返回或者如果描述符的属性是`null`、引发。If `null` is returned or if the property of the descriptor is `null`, an is thrown. 如果也会引发异常属性是`true`但上返回描述符的属性是`null`。The exception is also thrown if the property is `true` but the property on the returned descriptor is `null`. 4. 方法以获取相应令牌处理程序基于请求的标记的类型。The method to get the appropriate token handler based on the kind of token requested. 如果`null`返回，则引发。If `null` is returned, a is thrown. 5. 方法以获取令牌的颁发者名称。The method to get the issuer name for the token. 将引发名称是否`null`或为空; 否则设置属性描述符。Throws an if the name is `null` or empty; otherwise sets the property on the descriptor. 6. 方法获取的令牌和集生存期属性描述符。The method to get the lifetime for the token and sets the property on the descriptor. 7. 方法以获取颁发的令牌和集中包括的证明标记属性描述符。The method to get the proof token to include in the issued token and sets the property on the descriptor. 8. 方法以获取要包含在颁发的令牌和集中的声明属性描述符。The method to get the claims to include in the issued token and sets the property on the descriptor. 必须重写此方法。You must override this method. 9. 方法来创建响应 (RSTR)，其中包含已颁发的令牌。The method to create a response (RSTR) that contains the issued token. 您可以重写方法来实现一个自定义令牌颁发管道; 但是这通常是不需要在开发和测试环境中的哪些最自定义实现类旨在。You can override the method to implement a custom token issuance pipeline; however this is typically not necessary in the development and test environments for which most custom implementations of the class are intended. 在很多这种情况下您重写并方法和选择重写方法以提供可用的 STS 为您的环境。In many of these cases you override the and methods and optionally override the method to provide a serviceable STS for your environment. 是否需要进一步执行自定义您通常可以通过重写实现令牌颁发管道上面列出的默认值的每个阶段的方法提供它。If further customization is necessary you can often provide it by overriding the methods that implement each stage of the default token issuance pipeline listed above.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从令牌颁发管道调用方法 (方法) 来验证传入 RST。The method is called from the token issuance pipeline (the method) to validate the incoming RST. RST 进行验证的 STS 的要求 （策略），如果不是有效，将引发相应的异常。The RST is validated against the requirements (policy) of the STS and an appropriate exception is thrown if it is not valid. 默认实现类支持仅 RST RSTR 模式和仅问题的 Ws-trust 规范的绑定 (请求的属性必须设置为)。The default implementation of the class supports only the RST-RSTR pattern and only the Issue binding of the WS-Trust specification (the property of the request must be set to ). 此方法的默认实现强制实施这些要求 （和其他人异常部分中所述）。The default implementation of this method enforces these requirements (and others noted in the exceptions section). 如果必须强制实施自定义 STS 的不同的验证要求，可以重写此方法。You can override this method if you must enforce different validation requirements for your custom STS.
